translations: 营养（nourish 的过去式）；抚养

sentences.sentence: If patients are poorly nourished, the drugs make them feel nauseous.
sentences.translation: 如果病人营养不良，这些药物会让他们觉得恶心。

sentences.sentence: To make sure the children are well nourished, vitamin drops are usually recommended.
sentences.translation: 为确保孩子们营养充足，通常推荐使用维生素滴剂。

sentences.sentence: The children of the newly-literate mothers were also better nourished than those of women who could not read.
sentences.translation: 新识字的母亲的孩子也比那些不识字的母亲的孩子得到更好的营养。
